thread.title: PREVIEW: Young Guns, Engine Rooms, Southampton
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Young Guns, Engine Rooms, Southampton

title: PREVIEW: Young Guns, Engine Rooms, Southampton
text:
0 comments 
OVER the course of the past few years the London-based Young Guns have emerged as one of the UK's most electrifying new bands, garnering heavy radio play and UK chart success, while playing to packed-house crowds all across Europe. 
Highlights have included a main stage performance at the Reading Festival, where they tore up the stage as part of a lineup that included Arcade Fire, Queens of the Stone Age, Guns N' Roses and Modest Mouse. 
You can catch them at Southampton 's newest and fastest growing music venue, Engine Rooms this Sunday with a fantastic supporting line-up of Boy Jumps Hip and Yukovi. 
We've been told there is additional surprises in store as the band bring their branded pizza truck with them to serve Young Guns pizza to all their fans ahead of their show!' 
https://www.facebook.com/younggunsuk
